description:
The team continues onward toward the water pillar where they meet up with Ryuho’s 
parents and the legendary Dragon Shiryu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gorouhou no Himitsu! Keishou Seyo, Chichi, Shiryuu no Toushi!
Le secret du pic des cinq vieillards. Que la volonté de Shiryu soit transmise à son fils !
The Secret of the Rozan Five Peaks! Inherit the Fighting Spirit of Your Father Shiryu!
五老峰の秘密! 継承せよ, 父, 紫龍の闘志!
